overview:
• Solid experience in product management and development, strategic and financial planning and development of partnerships in sectors: Internet, retail and media. • Performance focused in the last 7 years in web product positioning; with a broad knowledge of current national and global online market. • Strong knowledge in research and studies of online markets, brand positioning, online campaigns, promotion and communication with consistent financial results.

Specialties: Product management, branding, product launch supply chain, marketing and sales, digital media, mobile marketing and advertising, monitorian new technologies, competitive analysis, usability, negotiation and identity.
